MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:12pm. Our emergency response team have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am.We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:56pm on Saturday, 20 March 2021
